author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Adds email address to the Local Bad Sender Domains.
commands.name: smg-block-email

commands.description: Removes email address from the Local Bad Sender Domains.
commands.name: smg-unblock-email

commands.description: Adds domain to the Local Bad Sender Domains group.
commands.name: smg-block-domain

commands.description: Adds IP address to the Local Bad Sender IPs  group.
commands.name: smg-block-ip

commands.description: Removes IP address from the Local Bad Sender IPs  group.
commands.name: smg-unblock-ip

commands.description: Removes domain from the Local Bad Sender Domains group.
commands.name: smg-unblock-domain

commands.description: Returns a list of all blocked email addresses.
commands.name: smg-get-blocked-domains

commands.description: Returns a list of all blocked IP addresses.
commands.name: smg-get-blocked-ips

integration.description: Symantec Messaging Gateway protects against spam, malware, targeted attacks and provides advanced content filtering, data loss prevention, and email encryption.
integration.name: Symantec Messaging Gateway

playbook.description:
This playbook blocks domains using Symantec Messaging Gateway.
The playbook checks whether the Symantec Messaging Gateway integration is enabled, whether the Domain input has been provided and if so, blocks the domain.
playbook.name: Block Domain - Symantec Messaging Gateway

playbook.description: This playbook will block email address at your email gateway.
playbook.name: Symantec block Email

description: Symantec Messaging Gateway protects against spam, malware, and targeted attacks and provides advanced content filtering, data loss prevention, and email encryption.
name: Symantec Messaging Gateway
